welcome_message_body: Welcome to Roosendaal, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport is used for the handling and storage of air freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zoersel Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login.
